title: Screw the rift im going to norms
body:
The rift ranked playlists are actually absurdly toxic, I get chat banned for saying either f*** or abo (my most recent chat ban), imagine if the players that actually want to spend 80 percent of the game didn't just get a chat ban but actually were removed from playing ranked for x amount of games or until they were level 1 honor. 
Add initiative for player to want to work together in a team game to accomplish a common goal?

replies.body: Why not just avoid using words that others tend to find offensive?
